projects.title: Underground Universal
projects.description: Designed and developed a dynamic website for Underground Universal, a fresh hip-hop label dedicated to empowering artists with full royalty control. With multiple functions including artist discovery, sharing, and collaborating, the platform underscores the commitment to nurturing creative autonomy and achieving artists' success.

projects.title: Diffusion Board Creator
projects.description: Created an innovative web application enabling users to curate and personalize their preferred online content, offering the convenience of utilizing a Chrome extension or manually adding URLs to organize blog posts, tweets, YouTube videos, and more into custom boards, engaging seamless sharing with friends.

projects.title: Twitter React App
projects.description: Engineered a replica of the Twitter web app using React, featuring essential post, like, and retweet functionalities within a visually identical and responsive user interface, designed for optimal performance across all devices.

web3Projects.title: Whac-a-NFT
web3Projects.description: Seamlessly integrated NFTs into an engaging, play-to-earn blockchain game reminiscent of Whac-a-Mole, allowing users to showcase their digital assets while also providing access to on-chain leaderboards to track player scores.

web3Projects.title: Solana Wallet Tracker
web3Projects.description: Developed a Solana wallet analysis tool enabling users to effortlessly track both token balances and NFT holdings, serving as a valuable learning project in the realm of Solana development.

web3Projects.title: Solana Pay Store
web3Projects.description: Established an e-commerce platform seamlessly integrated with Solana Pay, empowering users to make purchases using SPL tokens. Inspired from the Buildspace community.

web3Projects.title: Web3 Discovery
web3Projects.description: Developed a Web3 discovery application facilitating effortless exploration of 50+ blockchain companies and platforms, offering dynamic filtering, search, and detailed insights into our database.
